message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $18,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $15,000 for the product.
